title: Designing Online Mathematics Course Conversions for Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics and advanced subject-specific expertise
context.additional_context: Need to establish a customized online learning environment for professionals, designed to optimize personal device usage and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by performing peer evaluations and feedback three or more times in online discussion forums within three weeks.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply mathematical modeling by completing two real-case analysis projects over six weeks.
Learners submit five or more reflective journals in a digital portfolio at the course's conclusion to validate self-directed learning competencies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
